@gem_ray Looks like Zoom has a the ability to check whether you are muted or not in their client SDK https://t.co/F7YXbHf11O - which be more precise than detecting audio/video - I have been thoroughly nerdsniped, godspeed in your project!

@gem_ray Detecting audio video on OS X: https://t.co/NL1A57KeF4

Raspberry Pi LED based on JSON: https://t.co/nS0OMgwBeX

@gem_ray I would make a super-simple OS X app that checks whether audio/video are in use, and runs a local server that serves a JSON file with a single boolean, and then have a raspberry pi pull that file every 5-10 seconds, and light a green/red LED depending on the JSON value
